title: Unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information
body:
Hey Guys,

Every time I updated the LOL to 33% or 99% everytime there will always be information of "unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information", my computer is the Macbook Pro 2013 with Retina,about half a month ago,I played the game very well, then for some reason, my girlfriend deleted the game :( ,now I would like to re-install it but never be updated.
I hope someone can help me
Thanks a lot. 

{{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
i updating and  he stoped in 99% and i cant update i restart and i wait  wait and in 99% stopeed i dont know how to uptade i ??
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

I cant reinstall  when its 40-50 it just popps up unspecified error occurred please check logs for more information i dont know what to do i have downloaded hextech repair tool but its still now working can someone help me. Sorry for bad english

At 33% and above, your patcher completes scanning game files to prepare for updates and tries to establish comms with our patching servers.  A weak or loss of connection can end up causing you to receive that error or backtrack and not complete.  Your best bet is to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  MAke sure to select Mac instructions!  Let me know if you have any questions!

I did all the network settings, but still at the 33% there is the same problem, I really don't know what is the reason about my Mac and LOL, Can you help me?
Thanks a lot.

If none of the steps in the guide worked then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a look individually with you.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some context logs in your ticket.  We'll get back to you!

Hello,
I have download the HEXTECH REPAIR TOOL,but i don't know to use it?
Could u help me?
{{summoner:4}}

The tool should be able to run without issue through your desktop, but it's okay if any problems come up.  You can obtain the logs manually and attach it to the ticket.  

[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

I hope that helps!
i had same on win10 so if you got same os i suggest install new autoupdate for win10 that fixed issues for me
